### ROP without stack overflow (2)  {.smaller}


* example sequence: 

   * gadget 1: <code>push %rdi; jmp *(%rdx)</code>
   * gadget 2: <code>pop %rsp; ret</code>

* set: 

   * overwritten function pointer = pointer to gadget 1
   * arg 1: <code>%rdi</code> = desired stack pointer (pointer to next gadgets)
   * arg 3: <code>%rdx</code> = pointer to gadget 2
